text: After the disturbance had ended, Paul sent for the disciples, and after encouraging them and saying farewell, he left to go to Macedonia.

<st data-num="1330" class="">After</st> he had <st data-num="1330" class="">gone through</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> <st data-num="3313" class="">regions</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3870" class="">spoken</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">words</st> of <st data-num="3870" class="">encouragement</st><n id="2" /> to the <st data-num="846" class="">believers</st> there,<n id="3" /> he <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1671" class="">Greece</st>,<n id="4" />

where he <st data-num="1096" class="">stayed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="3376" class="">months</st>. Because the <st data-num="2453">Jews</st> had <st data-num="4160" class="">made</st><n id="2" /> a <st data-num="1917" class="">plot</st><n id="3" /> against <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> as he was <st data-num="3195" class="">intending</st><n id="4" /> to <st data-num="321" class="">sail</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4947" class="">Syria</st>, he <st data-num="1096 1106">decided</st><n id="6" /> to <st data-num="5290" class="">return</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="3109" class="">Macedonia</st>.<n id="7" />

Paul<n id="1" /> was <st data-num="4902" class="">accompanied</st> by <st data-num="4986" class="">Sopater</st> son of <st data-num="4450" class="">Pyrrhus</st> from <st data-num="961" class="">Berea</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="708" class="">Aristarchus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4580" class="">Secundus</st> from <st data-num="2331" class="">Thessalonica</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1050" class="">Gaius</st><n id="4" /> from <st data-num="1190" class="">Derbe</st>,<n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5095" class="">Timothy</st>, as well as <st data-num="5190" class="">Tychicus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5161" class="">Trophimus</st> from the province of <st data-num="774" class="">Asia</st>.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="3778" class="">These</st> had gone <st data-num="5281">on ahead</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> were <st data-num="3306">waiting for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5174" class="">Troas</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1473" class="">We</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1602">sailed away</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="5375" class="">Philippi</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> of <st data-num="106">Unleavened Bread</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="891" class="">within</st> <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st><n id="4" /> we <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">others</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5174" class="">Troas</st>,<n id="6" /> <st data-num="3699">where</st> we <st data-num="1304" class="">stayed</st> for <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>.

<st data-num="1722" class="">On</st> the <st data-num="1520" class="">first</st> day<n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="4521" class="">week</st>, when <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="4863" class="">met</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="2806" class="">break</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st>, <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> began to <st data-num="1256" class="">speak</st><n id="3" /> to the <st data-num="846" class="">people</st>, and because he <st data-num="3195" class="">intended</st><n id="4" /> to <st data-num="1826" class="">leave</st> the <st data-num="1887">next day</st>, he <st data-num="3905" class="">extended</st><n id="5" /> his <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st> <st data-num="3360" class="">until</st> <st data-num="3317" class="">midnight</st>.

(<st data-num="1161">Now</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="2425" class="">many</st> <st data-num="2985" class="">lamps</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="5253">upstairs room</st> <st data-num="3757" class="">where</st> we <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="4863">meeting</st>.)<n id="2" />

A <st data-num="3494" class="">young man</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">named</st> <st data-num="2161" class="">Eutychus</st>, who was <st data-num="2516" class="">sitting</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2376" class="">window</st>,<n id="1" /> was <st data-num="2702" class="">sinking</st><n id="2" /> into a <st data-num="901" class="">deep</st> <st data-num="5258" class="">sleep</st> while <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> continued to <st data-num="1256" class="">speak</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">for</st> a <st data-num="4183" class="">long time</st>. <st data-num="2702 5258">Fast asleep</st>,<n id="4" /> he <st data-num="4098">fell</st> <st data-num="2736">down</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="5152">third story</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="142" class="">picked up</st> <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="2597">went down</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1968" class="">threw</st> himself<n id="2" /> on <st data-num="846" class="">the young man</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4843" class="">put</st> his <st data-num="4843">arms around</st> him,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="2350" class="">distressed</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> still <st data-num="5590">alive</st>!”<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1161">Then</st> Paul<n id="1" /> <st data-num="305">went back upstairs</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> after he had <st data-num="2806" class="">broken</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1089" class="">eaten</st>, he <st data-num="3656" class="">talked with</st> them<n id="3" /> a <st data-num="2425">long time</st>, <st data-num="891" class="">until</st> <st data-num="827" class="">dawn</st>. <st data-num="3779" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="1831" class="">left</st>.
They took the boy home alive and were greatly comforted.
We went on ahead to the ship and put out to sea for Assos, intending to take Paul aboard there, for he had arranged it this way. He himself was intending to go there by land.

<st data-num="5613" class="">When</st> he <st data-num="4820" class="">met</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="789" class="">Assos</st>,<n id="1" /> we <st data-num="353" class="">took</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="353" class="">aboard</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="2064" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3412" class="">Mitylene</st>.<n id="3" />

We <st data-num="636" class="">set sail</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2547" class="">from there</st>, and on the <st data-num="1966" class="">following day</st> we <st data-num="2658" class="">arrived</st> <st data-num="481" class="">off</st> <st data-num="5508" class="">Chios</st>.<n id="2" /> The <st data-num="2087" class="">next day</st> we <st data-num="3846" class="">approached</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4544" class="">Samos</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> the day <st data-num="2192">after that</st> we <st data-num="2064" class="">arrived</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">at</st> <st data-num="3399" class="">Miletus</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> had <st data-num="2919" class="">decided</st> to <st data-num="3896" class="">sail past</st> <st data-num="2181" class="">Ephesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3704" class="">so</st> as <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="5551">spend time</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722">in</st> the province of <st data-num="773" class="">Asia</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> he was <st data-num="4692" class="">hurrying</st><n id="4" /> to <st data-num="1096" class="">arrive</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st>,<n id="5" /> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="1415" class="">possible</st>,<n id="6" /> by the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> of <st data-num="4005" class="">Pentecost</st>.
From Miletus he sent a message to Ephesus, telling the elders of the church to come to him.
When they arrived, he said to them, “You yourselves know how I lived the whole time I was with you, from the first day I set foot in the province of Asia,

<st data-num="1398" class="">serving</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="3326">with</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="5012" class="">humility</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> with <st data-num="1144" class="">tears</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> with the <st data-num="3986" class="">trials</st> that <st data-num="4819" class="">happened</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1722">because of</st> the <st data-num="1917" class="">plots</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st>.

You know that I <st data-num="5288" class="">did</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5288">hold back</st> from <st data-num="312" class="">proclaiming</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">anything</st> that would be <st data-num="4851" class="">helpful</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> from <st data-num="1321" class="">teaching</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1219" class="">publicly</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3624">house to house</st>,

<st data-num="1263" class="">testifying</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="5037" class="">both</st> <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1672" class="">Greeks</st> about <st data-num="3341" class="">repentance</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">toward</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1210" class="">compelled</st><n id="2" /> by the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="4198" class="">going</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3361" class="">without</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">knowing</st> what will <st data-num="4876" class="">happen</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1722 846">there</st>,<n id="4" />

<st data-num="4133" class="">except</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="1263" class="">warns</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4172">town after town</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1199" class="">imprisonment</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2347" class="">persecutions</st><n id="6" /> are <st data-num="3306" class="">waiting for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.
But I do not consider my life worth anything to myself, so that I may finish my task and the ministry that I received from the Lord Jesus, to testify to the good news of God’s grace.
“And now I know that none of you among whom I went around proclaiming the kingdom will see me again.

<st data-num="1360" class="">Therefore</st> I <st data-num="3143" class="">declare</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4594" class="">today</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="2513" class="">innocent</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> of you <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5288">hold back</st> from<n id="1" /> <st data-num="312" class="">announcing</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="3956" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="1012" class="">purpose</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="4337">Watch out</st> for<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> for <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4168" class="">flock</st> <st data-num="1722">of</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> has <st data-num="5087" class="">made</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1985" class="">overseers</st>,<n id="3" /> to <st data-num="4165" class="">shepherd</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="4046" class="">obtained</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> of <st data-num="2398">his own</st> Son.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="867" class="">gone</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="926" class="">fierce</st> <st data-num="3074" class="">wolves</st><n id="2" /> will <st data-num="1525">come in</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5339" class="">sparing</st> the <st data-num="4168" class="">flock</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Even</st> <st data-num="1537">from among</st> <st data-num="4771">your</st> <st data-num="846" class="">own group</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st><n id="2" /> will <st data-num="450" class="">arise</st>, <st data-num="2980" class="">teaching</st> <st data-num="1294">perversions of the truth</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="645" class="">draw</st> the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="645" class="">away</st> <st data-num="3694" class="">after</st> <st data-num="846">them</st>.

<st data-num="1352" class="">Therefore</st> <st data-num="1127">be alert</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3421" class="">remembering</st> <st data-num="3654">that</st> <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> for <st data-num="5148">three years</st> I did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3973" class="">stop</st> <st data-num="3560" class="">warning</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1538" class="">each</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of you <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1144" class="">tears</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> I <st data-num="3908" class="">entrust</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to <st data-num="2316">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to the <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st>. This message<n id="3" /> is <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="3618" class="">build</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3618" class="">up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> you an <st data-num="2817" class="">inheritance</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> those who are <st data-num="37" class="">sanctified</st>.

I have <st data-num="1937" class="">desired</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3762">no one’s</st> <st data-num="694" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5553" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2441" class="">clothing</st>.

<st data-num="1097" class="">You</st> <st data-num="846" class="">yourselves</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> of mine<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5256" class="">provided for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">needs</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the needs of those who <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.
By all these things, I have shown you that by working in this way we must help the weak, and remember the words of the Lord Jesus that he himself said, ‘It is more blessed to give than to receive.’”
When he had said these things, he knelt down with them all and prayed.

They <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">began</st> to <st data-num="2805" class="">weep</st> <st data-num="2425" class="">loudly</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1968 5137">hugged</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2705" class="">kissed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="3" />
especially saddened by what he had said, that they were not going to see him again. Then they accompanied him to the ship.
